name: kRisingLava
description: Rising lava gamemode! This plugin only watches the first minigame on a server.
author: Kodi022

Wait-Between-Rounds.description: Seconds to wait after round end

Water-Start-Height.description: Enable if you use Minigame's last man standing option

Exponential-Water.description: Should water speed up the higher it is

Count-Wins-Min-Players.description: Minimum players to start counting wins

Minigame-Last-Man-Standing.description: Enable if you use Minigame's last man standing option

Authorized-Users.description: For use of restricted commands (some commands require debug and auth)

commands.name: /lava
commands.description: Takes an option after command to control minigame. Probably won't need, may not work.

args.name: option
args.description: control word for minigame, leave empty for list

commands.name: /lavasetwins
commands.description: Sets the wins of a given person. Requires auth, may not work

args.name: name
args.description: Name of person to set, uses fuzzy search.
